Title: Frankenstein
Plot: Henry Frankenstein is a doctor who is trying to discover a way to make the dead walk. He succeeds and creates a monster that has to deal with living again.
Tagline: A Monster Science Created - But Could Not Destroy!
Writers: John L. Balderston, Mary Shelley, Peggy Webling, Garrett Fort, Francis Edward Faragoh, Richard Schayer, Robert Florey, John Russell
Stars: Colin Clive, Mae Clarke, Boris Karloff, John Boles
